title: WTTF: Low Condition T206 Southern Leaguers

posts.post_title: WTTF: Low Condition T206 Southern Leaguers
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Marc Del Percio
I'm looking to trade for the following low condition raw or graded T206 SL's to complete my set.  Very poor condition beaters are fine.  Here's what I need:

Bay
Foster
Helm
Jordan
Kiernan
Manion
Otey
Paige
Revelle
Seitz
C. Smith

Here is my tradelist:

GRADED T206:

Blackburne - SGC 30
Brown (Browne - Washington) - PSA 1
CHANCE HOF (yellow portrait) Tolstoi - SGC Auth. missing top right corner and has stamp on back
Knabe - PSA 1
Lake (no ball in hand) - PSA 1(MK) pencil mark on front
Nicholls (hands on knees) Sovereign 150 - SGC 10
Oakes - SGC 10
O'Leary (hands on knees) - SGC 10
Strang - SGC 10

RAW T206:

Byrne - p corner damage and scorch marks
CHANCE (yellow portrait) HOF - p missing lower left 1/4 of card and major paper loss on back
DUFFY - HOF Polar Bear p missing lower right corner
LENTZ - SL p/f
MARQUARD (hands at thighs) - HOF p/f
McGRAW (finger in air) - HOF p/f - $35
MILLER (Dallas) - SL p - $30

GRADED T205:

Bridwell - SGC 10
Doolan - PSA 2
Dougherty (Red Sock) - SGC 10
Foxen - SGC 10
Hoblitzell (name correct, Cin after stats) - PSA 3
Latham (W.A. on back) PSA 1
MATHEWSON HOF - SGC 10 (paper loss on left side of face)
Schlei - SGC 30
WALLACE HOF (no cap, 2 lines of stats) - SGC Authentic


RAW T205:

GRAY (no stats on back) - g-vg
Groom - p
Mattern - p

Thanks for looking and please e-mail with any offers.
